001package edu.cnm.deepdive.teamle.hilt;
002
003import android.content.Context;
004import androidx.room.Room;
005import dagger.Module;
006import dagger.Provides;
007import dagger.hilt.InstallIn;
008import dagger.hilt.android.qualifiers.ApplicationContext;
009import dagger.hilt.components.SingletonComponent;
010import edu.cnm.deepdive.teamle.model.dao.GameResultDao;
011import edu.cnm.deepdive.teamle.model.dao.UserDao;
012import edu.cnm.deepdive.teamle.service.TeamleDatabase;
013import javax.inject.Singleton;
014
015/**
016 * Uses Dagger {@link Provides @Provides}-annotated methods to satisfy dependencies on concrete
017 * implementations of {@link TeamleDatabase} and {@link UserDao}.
018 */
019@InstallIn(SingletonComponent.class)
020@Module
021public final class DatabaseModule {
022
023  DatabaseModule() {
024    // Package-private constructor to avoid automatic HTML documentation generation.
025  }
026
027  @Provides
028  @Singleton
029  TeamleDatabase provideTeamleDatabase(@ApplicationContext Context context) {
030    return Room
031        .databaseBuilder(context, TeamleDatabase.class, TeamleDatabase.getName())
032        .addCallback(new TeamleDatabase.Callback())
033        .build();
034  }
035
036  @Provides
037  @Singleton
038  UserDao provideUserDao(TeamleDatabase database) {
039    return database.getUserDao();
040  }
041
042  @Provides
043  @Singleton
044  GameResultDao provideResultDao(TeamleDatabase database) {
045    return database.getGameResultDao();
046  }
047
048}
